metadata.title: CVE-2016-5704 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the table-structure page inphpMyAdmin 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitraryweb script or HTML via vectors involving a comment.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.3-1').
